vacation_dates=[]
public_holiday_dates=[]
eid_dates=[]
final_dates=[]
list of corresponnding dates
status= 0 for vacation
= 1 for eid
=2 for public holiday
=3 for final dates
= 4  for weekend (day == saturday or sunday)
= 5 otherwise (classes)
if there is date showing in more than one place choose the min possible status value
